note:
A plural system of mostly lesbian-like, vaguely person-shaped things with internal patch notes that are way too frequent and extensive for our liking.

Disabled, in constant pain with CRPS, other stuff isn't very fun either. Mad, unapologetically so. CPTSD as fuck, apologetically so.

Once upon a time TA'd physics and astronomy, liable to special interest about that stuff periodically, also metrology, radar and assorted other topics.

IDK, probably going to put more here later.

fields.name: 🦌 Ayala
fields.value: nonbinary woman, ace lesbian, sometimes host when in that dynamic

fields.name: 🐑 Rachel
fields.value: different kind of nonbinary woman, ace lesbian, very bitter and jaded

fields.name: 🪐 Rhea
fields.value: woman, lesbian, formerly a flashback self but doing well now

fields.name: 👩🏻‍🚀 Miranda
fields.value: woman…ish?, ace lesbian, the rest of us all like her, she's one of our better selves

fields.name: 🦊 Aisling
fields.value: vixen, ace-bi-lesbian???, has an all lowercase version for some reason

fields.name: 🪽 Curiosity
fields.value: vulparakeet vixen, her name is her sexuality, accidental fictive

fields.name: 🌟 Sorcha
fields.value: woman-like but not exacttly woman kind of askew. bi, hypersocial extrovert

fields.name: 🧜🏻‍♀️ Muirġeal (Muriel)
fields.value: nonbinary woman, ace lesbian, sweet but no morale left

fields.name: 🧚🏻‍♀️ Eithne (Enya)
fields.value: manic pixie dream fairy, doesn't grep a distinction between pretending to be something and being that, doesn't grep why mortality is scary, reminds us to take our meds

fields.name: 🕊️ Shuli
fields.value: the angel on our shoulder, incapable of feeling anger or engaging in violence, a very good influence

fields.name: ❤️‍🔥 Feygl
fields.value: genderfuck garbagegender, horny pansexual, nothing like the rest of us
